description.value:
The secrets of time peel back, revealing deeper truths. You gain either the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stasis] domain spell or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Path of Least Resistance] focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Special You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.
